edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simpletimer.test.model.state

Class AbstractTimerStateMachineTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.luc.etl.cs313.android.simpletimer.test.model.state.AbstractTimerStateMachineTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultTimerStateMachineTest

    public abstract class AbstractTimerStateMachineTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Testcase superclass for the timer state machine model. Unit-tests the state machine in fast-forward mode by directly triggering successive tick events without the presence of a pseudo-real-time clock. Uses a single unified mock object for all dependencies of the state machine model.
